item.title: Bootstrap Shortcode
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Buttons with built in link and title

[button title="The Title" link="http://google.com"] hello [/button] Without title attribute, WordPress will use the text that is surround by the button shortcode.

Button Container

[buttoncon]I am a contained button[/buttoncon]

Button Built Columns

[column size="4"][button link="http://google.com"] hello [/button][/column][column size="4"][buttoncon]I am a contained button[/buttoncon][/column][column size="4"][button link="http://google.com"] hello [/button][/column]

Buttons in Tabs

[tabs] [tab title="tab1"] [button link="http://google.com"] hello [/button] [/tab] [tab title="tab2"] [buttoncon]I am a contained button[/buttoncon] [/tab] [tab title="Tab3"] [column size="4"][button link="http://google.com"] hello [/button][/column][column size="4"][buttoncon]I am a contained button[/buttoncon][/column][column size="4"][button link="http://google.com"] hello [/button][/column] [/tab] [/tabs]

Buttons Built into Accordions

[accordions collapsible="true" active="false"] [accordion title="Your Section 1 Title"] [button link="http://google.com"] hello [/button] [/accordion] [accordion title="Your Section 2 Title"] [buttoncon]I am a contained button[/buttoncon] [/accordion] [accordion title="Your Section 3 Title"] [button link="http://google.com"] hello [/button] [/accordion] [/accordions] [alert][button link="http://google.com"] hello [/button] [buttoncon]I am a contained button[/buttoncon][/alert]

Thumbnails

[break]

Thumbnails with Columns

[thumbnails][column size="4"]I am a container with the thumbnail attached[/column][column size="4"]I am a container with the thumbnail attached[/column][column size="4"]I am a container with the thumbnail attached[/column][/thumbnails]

Thumbnails with Columns and other Shortcode

[thumbnails][column size="4"][button link="http://google.com"] hello [/button][/column][column size="4"][icon][icon name="star"][icon name="star-empty"][icon name="road"][icon name="screenshot"][/column][column size="4"][alert name="info"]I am a container with the thumbnail attached[/alert][/column][/thumbnails]

Thumbnails in Tabs

[tabs][tab title="Tab 1"][thumbnails][column size="4"][button link="http://google.com"] hello [/button][/column][column size="4"][icon][icon name="star"][icon name="star-empty"][icon name="road"][icon name="screenshot"][/column][column size="4"][alert name="info"]I am a container with the thumbnail attached[/alert][/column][/thumbnails][/tab][tab title="Tab 2"][label name='"']Default[/label] [label name="success"]Success[/label] [label name="warning"]Warning[/label] [label name="info"]Info[/label] [label name="important"]Important[/label] [label name="inverse"]Inverse[/label][/tab][/tabs]

Alerts

[break] [alert]I am a container with the thumbnail attached[/alert] [alert name="success"]I am a container with the thumbnail attached[/alert] [alert name="info"]I am a container with the thumbnail attached[/alert] [alert name="error"][icon][icon name="star"][icon name="star-empty"][icon name="road"][icon name="screenshot"] I am a container with the thumbnail attached[/alert]

Labels

[break] [label name='"']Default[/label] [label name="success"]Success[/label] [label name="warning"]Warning[/label] [label name="info"]Info[/label] [label name="important"]Important[/label] [label name="inverse"]Inverse[/label]

Badges

[break] [badge name=""]1[/badge] [badge name="success"]2[/badge] [badge name="warning"]3[/badge] [badge name="info"]4[/badge] [badge name="important"]5[/badge] [badge name="inverse"]6[/badge] [alert] [label name='"']Default[/label] [label name="success"]Success[/label] [label name="warning"]Warning[/label] [label name="info"]Info[/label] [label name="important"]Important[/label] [label name="inverse"]Inverse[/label] [badge name=""]1[/badge] [badge name="success"]2[/badge] [badge name="warning"]3[/badge] [badge name="info"]4[/badge] [badge name="important"]5[/badge] [badge name="inverse"]6[/badge] [/alert]

Colours

[colour]Text and more text.[/colour] [colour option="clouds"]Text and more text.[/colour] [colour option="clouds-bg"]Text and more text.[/colour] [colour option="pomegranate alizarin-bg"]Content[/colour] Colour Options: http://clf.educ.ubc.ca/bootstrap-shortcodes/#color-options

Lead

[lead]Text[/lead]

Wells

[break] [well]I am a container with the thumbnail attached [back_to_top][/well] [well name="large"]I am a container with the thumbnail attached[/well]

Back to Top

[break] [back_to_top]

Break

[break]
